attacks.name: Poison Bite
attacks.special: The target receives a number of Hits equal to the amount of HP they are below their starting HP.

attacks.name: Tail Swipe
attacks.special: All Characters within 2" are targeted by this Attack. If a Critical Hit is rolled, and they are on a smaller baes size, the target Character is Prone.

traits.name: Fungal Regeneration
traits.description: If this Character is not in base contact with an enemy Character at the end of the Round, it regains D6 HP.
